sources.title: Megafault | Full Action Disaster Movie | Brittany Murphy
sources.description:
Megafault - When miner Charley 'Boomer' Baxter sets off a series of massive mining detonations in West Virginia, a gigantic earthquake is soon rocking the North Atlantic, exposing a deep seismic fault that runs the length of the North American continent. Joining forces with government seismology expert Dr Amy Lane, Boomer must now race against time to stop the chasm that is threatening to tear America - and the entire world - in half.
2009. Stars: Brittany Murphy, Eriq La Salle, Bruce Davison
